page.title: 18LEISURE CHILDREN'S CLUBS
page.content: Many of the clubs are held in the Village Hall which is near the play- ground and playing field. Mother and Toddlers club is held weekly.Preschool children play together whilst mothers chat over coffee. The playgroup for children from 2\ to school age is held two mornings each week. The playgroup leader is helped by one permanent aid and a rota of parents. About nineteen children attend each session. Youth Club is on Wednesday night. The junior club, for children from 5 to 12 years, meets from 6.30 to 8pm, followed by a club for older children until 9.45 pm. Snooker, pool, table-tennis, darts, painting and out-door games are all available. A cub pack meets each week for boys from Winteringham and nearby villages. This is followed by a scout troop meeting.Brownies and guides have to travel elsewhere for meetings.
